summary: Vanilla warpaint replacer -high resolution & depixelated, requires SKSE (1.6.9 or later)
descriptionHtml:
All female warpaints redone in 2048x2048 
 *Added alternative 1k (1024x1024) version

            Requires SKSE 1.6.9 or later to be installed first
http://skse.silverlock.org/
            For the warpaints to look right you must also have the SKSE.ini  
If you do not have an ini for SKSE yet it is quite easy to create one
 1. Locate your SKSE folder: Data>SKSE (make one if there isn\'t one present)
 2. Create SKSE.ini (use notepad and just save it as \"SKSE.ini\"
 3. Add the text: \" [Display] \" , hit enter, then add the text : \" iTintTextureResolution=2048 \"
Voila
     
        RaceMenu by Expired- Not required to work but needed to access all warpaints 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624

       ShowRaceMenu Precache Killer by kapaer is really awesome, especially if you have other mods for tintmasks, hair, eyes etc
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33526

** Suggestions/critiques are welcome, I have been staring at these so long I may not see them the way you do- fresh perceptions are always helpful. i.e. Are there certain ones you don\'t like? Are there some that need improvement? etc. But please be nice, this is my hobby while I review lectures- not my career, I am not a pro.
Note:
-They aren\'t exactly the same as vanilla because once I re-sized them from 256x256 it was hard to decipher some of the original artists\'s intent- so I improvised

-Definitely not perfect, but better than the pixelated mess they were beforehand

-The male warpaints are a work in progress and I am refitting them to the female face- I have included the male blackblood and the 1st male imperial warpaint in a separate file

- Yessss Xenius has done a  very nice high res version already. His are more weathered/worn looking than some of the ones I re-did, and I kind of like a more solid look to most. Personal pref. You can find his mod at : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4489

I am pretty busy/absent minded so if you want to ask a question please just send me a pm, I probably won\'t check comments consistently

Permissions:
If you feel like improving them be my guest, I am still learning, just let me know
author: Tara
